sqlMap.select: SELECT reason_id as reasonId, reason_text as reasonText FROM report_reason_info where reason_type=#type# and status=1

SELECT business_id as businessId, reporter_id as reporterId, reporter_mail as reporterMail, comment, reporter_phone as reporterPhone, report_time, report_reason_id, reporter_name from business_report_info where business_id=#businessId# and status=1
sqlMap.insert: insert into business_report_info (business_id, reporter_id, reporter_mail, comment, reporter_phone, report_time, report_reason_id, reporter_name) values(#businessId#,#reporterId#, #reporterMail#,#comment#,#reporterPhone#,now(),#reportReasonId#,#reporterName#)
